blink: Use CSS animation with the display property instead.
dir: Use the ul or ol tag and the list-style property.
marquee: It's not the 90's anymore (Use CSS animation with transform properties instead).
s: Use the text-decoration property if applicable, or use the del tag instead.
strike: Use the text-decoration property if applicable, or use the del tag instead.
tt: Use the font-family property or the kbd, code, or spam tag instead.
